statements: SELECT * FROM error_correction_resources;
SELECT resource_id, resource_name, allocated_date FROM error_correction_resources WHERE allocation_status = 'active';
SELECT resource_name, allocated_to_device FROM error_correction_resources WHERE allocated_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM error_correction_resources WHERE allocated_by_user = 'John Doe';
SELECT resource_name, allocation_status FROM error_correction_resources ORDER BY allocated_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM error_correction_resources WHERE allocated_by_user = 'John Doe' ORDER BY allocated_date DESC;
SELECT resource_name, allocated_date, allocated_by_user FROM error_correction_resources WHERE allocation_status = 'Pending' ORDER BY resource_name ASC;
SELECT resource_name, allocated_to_device, allocation_status FROM error_correction_resources WHERE allocated_to_device LIKE '%Laptop%' LIMIT 5;
SELECT DISTINCT allocated_by_user FROM error_correction_resources WHERE allocation_status = 'Completed' ORDER BY allocated_by_user;
SELECT resource_name, allocation_status FROM error_correction_resources ORDER BY allocation_status, allocated_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM error_correction_jobs;
SELECT job_id, error_type FROM error_correction_jobs;
SELECT quantum_device_id, status FROM error_correction_jobs WHERE error_type = 'data loss';
SELECT device_name, manufacturer, total_qubits FROM quantum_devices;
SELECT device_name, total_qubits FROM quantum_devices ORDER BY total_qubits DESC;
SELECT error_type, status FROM error_correction_jobs WHERE quantum_device_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM quantum_devices WHERE manufacturer = 'IBM';
SELECT job_id, error_type FROM error_correction_jobs WHERE status = 'completed' ORDER BY job_id DESC;
SELECT device_name, manufacturer, total_qubits FROM quantum_devices WHERE total_qubits > 50 ORDER BY manufacturer, total_qubits DESC;
SELECT error_type, COUNT(job_id) AS error_count FROM error_correction_jobs GROUP BY error_type;
SELECT * FROM resource_allocation;
SELECT id, device_id, allocation_date FROM resource_allocation ORDER BY allocation_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM quantum_devices WHERE manufacturer = 'IBM';
SELECT id, device_name, quantum_cores FROM quantum_devices WHERE location LIKE '%lab%';
SELECT id, task_name, task_description FROM error_correction_tasks ORDER BY id LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM resource_allocation WHERE allocated_cores > 5;
SELECT id, device_id, allocation_date FROM resource_allocation WHERE device_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM quantum_devices WHERE quantum_cores BETWEEN 10 AND 20 ORDER BY manufacturer DESC;
SELECT device_name, location FROM quantum_devices WHERE manufacturer = 'IBM' AND quantum_cores >= 15;
SELECT task_name, task_description FROM error_correction_tasks WHERE completion_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM resource_allocation;
SELECT id, start_time, end_time FROM resource_allocation WHERE device_id='123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT name, location FROM quantum_devices WHERE status='active';
SELECT id, name, description FROM error_correction_routines ORDER BY complexity DESC;
SELECT * FROM routine_allocations WHERE allocation_id='123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' AND allocated=true;
SELECT id, start_time, end_time FROM resource_allocation WHERE device_id = 'abcd-1234' ORDER BY start_time ASC
SELECT * FROM error_correction_resources;
SELECT resource_name, resource_type FROM error_correction_resources WHERE allocated_time > '2022-01-01';
SELECT resource_name, resource_type FROM error_correction_resources WHERE resource_type = 'Manual';
SELECT * FROM quantum_devices ORDER BY device_name DESC;
SELECT device_name, device_location FROM quantum_devices WHERE device_type = 'Qubit';
SELECT * FROM error_correction_resources ORDER BY resource_name DESC;
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM quantum_devices WHERE device_location = 'Laboratory A';
SELECT resource_name, resource_type, allocated_time FROM error_correction_resources WHERE resource_type = 'Algorithm' AND allocated_time > '2022-01-01';

SELECT ECT.task_description, ECR.error_type, ECR.error_details FROM error_correction_tasks AS ECT INNER JOIN error_correction_results AS ECR ON ECT.task_id = ECR.task_id WHERE ECT.task_status = 'Completed';

SELECT EAR.allocation_id, EAR.start_time, EAR.end_time, EC.resource_name FROM resource_allocation AS EAR INNER JOIN error_correction_resources AS EC ON EAR.resource_id = EC.resource_id ORDER BY EAR.start_time DESC;
